item.description:
Sounds of Frank Sinatra is a great way to end our summer concerts
Bring a chair, picnic to share and enjoy!!
I-91 from Springfield – Heading South:
· Take Windsor Exit 36 (Park Avenue) and at the end of the ramp take a left onto Park Avenue (CT 178)
· Continue east to the next stoplight (about .8 miles) to a T-Intersection with where CT 178 meets CT 159 or Windsor Avenue
· Take a Left onto Windsor Avenue ~ .7 miles (name changes to Broad Street )
· The Windsor Town Green is located in front of Town Hall - a large brick building on the right between the first and second lights with a clock tower and fountain in front.
· Take a right at the second light (Maple Street) and stay to the right of the Post Office. Turn right again into the Town Hall parking lot.
I-91 from Hartford - Heading North:
· Take Windsor Exit 36 (Park Ave.) and at the end of the ramp take a right onto Park Avenue (CT 178).
· Continue east to the next stoplight (about .8 miles) to a T-Intersection with where CT 178 meets CT 159 or Windsor Ave.
· Take a Left onto Windsor Avenue ~ .7 miles (name changes to Broad Street )
· The Windsor Town Green is located in front of Town Hall - a large brick building on the right between the first and second lights with a clock tower and fountain in front.
Take a right at the second light (Maple Street) and stay to the right of the Post Office. Turn right again
into the Town Hall parking lot.

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Sounds of Frank at Windsor Green
